content.content:
2. (1) The functions of the Director of Land Registration referred to in the sections set out in Column 2 of Schedule 2 of the Acts set out opposite thereto in Column 1 of Schedule 2 are transferred to the Director of Titles.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 998, s. 2 (1). (2) Despite subsection (1), the Director of Land Registration shall retain concurrent authority to perform the functions transferred under subsection (1).  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 998, s. 2 (2). Schedule 1 Revoked: O. Reg. 383/16, s. 2. Schedule 2 Item   Column 1   Column 2 

  1.   Revoked: O. Reg. 383/16, s. 3.  

  2.   Registry Act   cl. 97 (b) 

  3.   Land Titles Act   s. 8 (with respect to function under clause 97 (b) of the Registry Act only) R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 998, Sched. 2; O. Reg. 383/16, s. 3.  Français
content.raw_html:
2. (1) The functions of the Director of Land Registration referred to in the sections set out in Column 2 of Schedule 2 of the Acts set out opposite thereto in Column 1 of Schedule 2 are transferred to the Director of Titles.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 998, s. 2 (1).

(2) Despite subsection (1), the Director of Land Registration shall retain concurrent authority to perform the functions transferred under subsection (1).  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 998, s. 2 (2).

Schedule 1 Revoked: O. Reg. 383/16, s. 2.
